page.title: 04Housing in Tiptoe Village.
page.content: From a survey of housing in Tiptoe we discovered that the most popular type of housing is a detached bungalow followed by detached houses, chalet bungalows, semi-detached houses and two caravans. Mrs Lilly lives in a two bedroom detached bungalow, built in 1932. She lives with her husband and mother. They have 6 rooms including a bathroom and toilet and have central heating. She prefers living in the bungalow to her previous house. Mrs Turner lives in a detached 2 bedroom house built in 1935. She lives with her husband. They have 5 rooms including a bathroom and toilet and have central heating. They keep a horse in their garden. Mrs Benham lives in a 4 bedroom chalet bungalow with her husband and 2 children. They have central heating.
